member.name: T:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions
member.summary: a completion for the chat message

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.model
member.summary: ID of the model to use. gpt-4, gpt-4-0314, gpt-4-32k, gpt-4-32k-0314, gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-3.5-turbo-0301

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.temperature
member.summary: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.max_tokens
member.summary: The maximum number of tokens allowed for the generated answer. By default, the number of tokens the model can return will be (4096 - prompt tokens).

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.presence_penalty
member.summary: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.frequency_penalty
member.summary: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.messages
member.summary: The messages to generate chat completions for

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.n
member.summary: How many chat completion choices to generate for each input message.

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.Completions.user
member.summary: A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse

member.name: P:ChatGPT.API.Framework.ChatGPTClient.Completions
member.summary: a completion for the chat message
